biography.content:
Pavel Krömer has received the master degree in computer science from the VSB - Technical University of Ostrava in 2006 and PhD in Applied Mathematics from the same institute in 2010.
His area of interest includes computational intelligence, information retrieval, the World Wide Web, data mining, and parallel computing. He has focused on development of innovative techniques as well as deployment of intelligent optimization methods in different application domains.
Pavel has been employed by a large European software company between July 2005 and September 2010. His role was software developer and analyst. He has served for more than 5 years as Java and WebSphere MQ developer in an international environment of a major European IT corporation.
Pavel has joined the Department of Computer Science at the VSB – Technical University of Ostrava as full time research associate and assistant professor for data mining on 1. 10. 2010. Since 1. 9. 2011, he also works as junior researcher in the IT4Innovations center of Excellence. Pavel is with the University of Alberta, Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, in 2014.
